attributes.action: Cut ticket prices at stamford bridge
attributes.additional_details: We are getting priced out from the club we love and it's disgraceful. Help us get stamford bridge back to the way it used to be, affordable and a good atmosphere. That's not too much to ask for is it? Truth is, ticket prices has gone way higher than the rate of inflation and we can't afford it.

rejection.details: The Government is, though, monitoring the situation and is encouraging the football authorities to consider fans more.
